backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing storage, access control, chatrooms, messages, users, and reactions with admin‑protected operations and various data types defined for chat features.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI layout and styling changes to MessageInput.tsx with associated components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all frontend files, including components, hooks, pages, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React application via main.tsx and defines viewport settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, theme provider, layout with header/footer rules, and 404 handling for lobby, chatroom, and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog for selecting, uploading, searching, or removing user avatars with Giphy integration and image validation.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat area handling message list display, auto‑scrolling, replies, pinned video, header collapsing, and sending messages via hooks.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails, live status, and Twitter/Twitch/YouTube preview fetching.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog for creating chatrooms with fields for metadata and media uploads or links, including Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying app credit and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app title, username editing, avatar picker, and back navigation.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that renders nothing and disables authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays a chat message with reactions, media embeds, Twitter loading, and pin/reply interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Input box for sending messages with support for images, video URLs, Twitter links, and voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio player component with play/pause, waveform visualization, time tracking, and synced playback control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains chatroom, search, and message-related React Query hooks with localStorage helpers and image compression.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, mobile input fixes, and custom voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines Giphy API key and result limit constants.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into compact k/M/B notation.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides Giphy search and trending fetch functions with error handling and GIF mapping.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Placeholder file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side utility that loads, resizes, and recompresses images with progress callbacks and returns the smaller of original or compressed output.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter embed rendering logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data, extracts safe preview fields, caches results, and deduplicates simultaneous fetches.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: localStorage-backed cache for Twitter preview data with validation, versioning, and expiration support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for caching Twitter thumbnails.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Parses YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs to extract IDs and generate thumbnails, plus URL-type detection helpers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry file that mounts React, configures query client, and wraps the app with identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring a password to view and delete chatrooms, with session-based auth and deletion UI.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom by ID, increments its view count, handles loading/error states, and renders the chat area.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby page component that fetches and displays chatrooms with search, category filtering, and create-chatroom dialog logic.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, radius, animations, and plugins such as typography and container queries.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project state, existing feature requests, and pending requirements for chatroom input UI changes.
